variations.template: You may pay 3 life in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.
rts: You may pay 3 life in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.

rts: You may sacrifice an artifact or Goblin in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.
You may sacrifice an artifact or creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.

variations.template: You may return a land you control to its owner's hand in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.
rts: You may return a land you control to its owner's hand in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.
